history.content:
hello! most of these is answered @445.

1) In general, our UD courses are intended for juniors and seniors, but it is technically possible for sophomores to take it. 

2) CS 70 (and math 54).

3) I can five you the quantitative data according to student surveys posted on HKN. You'll want to look at the spring offerings (because the fall offerings is what is now CS 168). 

4) Generally, most EE upper divs are fine to phase 2, but I recommend monitoring enrollment to see how fast it fills up.

children.subject: I think it might help to contact the instructor about the material covered...
How crucial is the knowledge from CS70? I will be taking it concurrently next semester.

history.content:
I can't seem to find much information about this class, so I have a couple questions:

1) What grade level is this class intended for? Would I be ok taking it as a second year?

2) 61B, Math 53, 54 seem to be the official prereqs, but are there any other classes that having taken would help a lot in 122?

3) How is the workload for this class compared to other EECS courses?

4) Should I phase 1 or phase 2 this class?

Thanks!
history.subject: EE122
